head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SESSA, FRANCIS X.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SESSA, FRANCIS X.

block.p: SESSA-Francis X. 0n Oct. 24, 2000. Funeral Director 55 yrs. Beloved husband of Catherine P., loving father of Peter and Jay. Dear brother of Robert J. (Fresno, CA), Papa-Cheech to Courtney, Dana, Peter, Reid & Samantha. Visiting Thursday, 7-9, Friday, 2-5, and 7-9, Jospeh V. Sessa Funeral Home, 6924 Ft. Hamilton Pkway, Mass of Christian burial, Saturday 10:15am at St. Ephrem Church. In lieu of flowers, donations to Poly Prep in Frank's memory appreciated.
